item.title: About Me
item.description:
Introduction

Jimmy Song (宋净超) is a cloud native developer advocate worked for Ant Group , CNCF Ambassador , co-founder of ServiceMesher community and Cloud Native Community. He is an outstanding translator, author and producer of PHEI. Early adopters and evangelis of Kubernetes and Istio.

Publications

Jimmy Song has published several books since 2017, see the book page for details .

Copyright

  • Future Architecture - From SOA to Cloud Native, Zhang Liang,Wu Sheng, Ao Xiaojian, Song Jingchao

Translation

  • Cloud Native Go - Build cloud-native web applications and microservices based on Go and React
  • Cloud Native Python - Build cloud native applications with Python and React
  • Cloud Native Java - Build cloud native applications with Java

Reviewed

  • Mastering Service Mesh

Focused domains

He mainly focuses on cloud native fields, including containers, microservices, service mesh, serverless and other technologies, and is keen to participate in open source software and open source communities.

Community

Jimmy Song is the co-founder of ServiceMesher and Cloud Native community,

ServiceMesher Community

ServiceMesher community by a group with the same values and ideals of volunteers co-sponsored, was established in April 2018. The mission of the ServiceMesher community is to disseminate Service Mesh technology, build an open source culture, strengthen industry communication, and promote the landing of Service Mesh in the enterprise. The community’s website is https://www.servicemesher.com.

Cloud Native Community

The Cloud Native Community started with the K8S & CloudNative Practice Group which was founded in 2016, covering thousands of cloud native early adopters. Ant it was reorganized in May 2020 with Jimmy and his partners. The community aims to build an open and inclusive communication environment to promote the spread and popularity of cloud native technologies. The community's website is https://cloudnative.to.

Participatation

2020

  • September 24, 2020 | Virtual | CSDI | Producter
  • September 18, 2020 | Nanjing | NJSD | Producer
  • July 4, 2020 | Shenzhen | GIAC | Producer

2019

  • June 24, 2019 | Shanghai | KubeCon + CloudNativeCon + Open Source Summit Pre-Conference Co-Located Events | Producer

2018

  • November 14, 2018 | Shanghai | KubeCon + CloudNativeCon China
  • May 20th, 2018 | Nanjing | Global Technology Week 2018 and the Fourth Nanjing (Global) Software Conference | The Next Step for Cloud Native Applications
  • March 23-25, 2018 | Beijing | Kubernetes combat training | Kubernetes combat training | Beijing

2017

  • December 16, 2017 | Beijing | micro generation services: Service Mesh IS Coming | IT large number of people say that coffee Clouds & TalkingData meetup
  • December 8, 2017 | Beijing | ArchSummit (Global Architects Summit) | From Kubernetes to Cloud Native-The Road to Cloud Native Applications
  • October 15, 2017 | Hangzhou | KEUC 2017 (Kubernetes China User Conference) | k8smeetup Best Community Translator and Best Technical Column Author
  • September 23, 2017 | Beijing | Kubernetes combat training | Kubernetes cloud native application design and combat
  • August 26, 2017 | Beijing | Technology・Offline Salon: Cloud Native and Microservices | Cloud Native and Microservices
  • July 7, 2017 | Shenzhen | ArchSummit (Global Architects Summit) | Microservices and cloud-native application practices using kubernetes

2016

  • October 20, 2016 | Shanghai | Qcon | Yarn on Docker-Application of Container Technology in Big Data Scenarios
  • October 13, 2016 | Hangzhou | Yunqi Conference | Management and Scheduling of Large-scale Container Clusters
  • August 15, 2016 | Shanghai | MSA-summit (Global Microservices Architecture Technology Conference) | Docker-based Big Data Cluster Virtualization Practice
  • June 19th, 2016 | Beijing | Ghostcloud Four City Linked Large-scale Tour Event | Let Docker Hear the Voice of China
